# Pull Request

## Summary
Describe the change and motivation.

## Type of change
- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] refactor
- [ ] docs
- [ ] chore

## Testing
Describe how you tested your changes. Include steps and screenshots/logs where helpful.

## Checklist
- [ ] Lints pass; no analyzer errors
- [ ] App builds and runs on target platforms
- [ ] README/CHANGELOG updated if user-visible
- [ ] Tests added/updated where applicable

## Related issues
Link issues or discussions.
